title: SCP-005 Proposal Hub
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
[[=]]
++ THE FOLLOWING FILES HAVE BEEN CLASSIFIED

+ [[size 200%]]ULTRA DARK SUPREME LEVEL 005/KEY MEGA CLEARANCE [[/size]]

++ BY ORDER OF GOD
[[/=]]
-----
[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]
[[==]]
**GENERAL NOTICE 005-Sigma:** In order to prevent knowledge of SCP-005 from being leaked, thousands of false SCP-005 files have been created alongside the true file. These decoys have been created to be indistinguishable from the true SCP-005, along with several additional levels of obfuscation to prevent its true identity from being discovered. All files concerning the nature of SCP-005, including the decoys, are protected by a memetic keyll agent designed to induce immediate death, which will kill an individual to such a degree that they will die, in unauthorized personnel attempting to access this file. Revealing the true nature of SCP-005 to the general public is cause for death, etc.
[[/==]]
[[/div]]
-----
[[=]]
+ [[size 200%]]WARNING:[[/size]]

ANY NON-AUTHORIZED PERSONNEL ACCESSING THIS FILE WILL BE IMMEDIATELY KILLED TO DEATH VIA **LOCKE-ENKEY** MEMETIC KEYLL AGENT. ATTEMPTING TO BREACH THE COPIOUS SECURITY MEASURES EMPLOYED WITHIN THIS ARTICLE WITHOUT PROPER INOCULATION WILL RESULT IN IMMEDIATE DEATH FOLLOWED BY EXPIRATION, AND POTENTIALLY PERISHING.

+ YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.
[[/=]]
-----
